conversation.content: Hello! Welcome to our appointment booking service. I'm here to help you schedule your visit. What service would you like to book today? We offer: haircut, massage, consultation, facial, manicure.
I'd like to book a massage
Excellent choice! A massage takes about 60 minutes and costs $80. When would you like to come in? I have availability today, tomorrow, or later this week.
Perfect! For tomorrow, I have these times available: 9:00 AM, 10:00 AM, 11:00 AM, 2:00 PM, 3:00 PM, 4:00 PM. Which time works best for you?
Great! I have you down for 2:00 PM on tomorrow. May I have your full name for the appointment?
Thank you, John Smith! What's the best phone number to reach you for confirmations?
Got it! And what's your email address? We'll send you a confirmation and reminder.

Let me confirm your appointment details:

📋 Service: Massage
📅 Date: Tomorrow
⏰ Time: 2:00 PM
👤 Name: John Smith
📞 Phone: (555) 123-4567
📧 Email: john.smith@email.com

💰 Cost: $80
⏱️ Duration: 60 minutes

Is everything correct?

Wonderful! Your massage appointment is confirmed for tomorrow at 2:00 PM. Total cost will be $80. We'll send a confirmation to (555) 123-4567 and john.smith@email.com. We look forward to seeing you! Have a fantastic day!
